mapper.insert: insert into member( m_id, m_password, m_name, m_nick, m_age, m_gender, m_phone, m_address1, m_address2, m_picture, m_email, m_terms1, m_terms2, m_regdate, m_warned, m_banned, m_quitted, m_type )values( #{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_nick}, #{m_age}, #{m_gender}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address1}, #{m_address2}, #{m_picture}, #{m_email}, #{m_terms1}, #{m_terms2}, curdate(), #{m_warned}, #{m_banned}, #{m_quitted}, #{m_type} )
mapper.select: select A.m_id, A.m_nick, A.m_type, B.point from member as A inner join point as B on A.m_id = B.m_id where A.m_id = #{inputId} and A.m_password = #{inputPassword}
